knimeNode.name: Convolver
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generic Convolver to convolve an image with a given convolution kernel (which is also an image).

fullDescription.intro: Generic Convolver to convolve an image with a given kernel (i.e. another image). One way to create kernels is the "Convolution Kernel Creator"-node. Remark: All incoming kernels must have the same number of dimensions, else you have to use two different Convolvers (one after the other).

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The column containing the kernel images.

Select the orientation of the kernel. The number of select dimensions must be the same as the number of dimensions of the kernel. If your kernel has the same dimensionality as your input image, this setting has no effect).
If checked, the complete convolution will be calculated in float precision. The result will also be a float image.
